entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
